title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 442.27 - In-service education - nonnursing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 442.27 - In-service education - nonnursing

State Regulations
[ 1670 ]
All expenses, including student
and instructor salaries, associated with nonnursing in-service education
activities must be included in the functional cost center to which the
participating employees' salaries and wages are assigned, as such in-service
educational activities will rarely apply to more than one functional
activity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
442.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
